descriptionHtml:
Waraxes and battleaxes have perks "bleeding": for Battleaxe "Limbsplitter" for waraxes "Hack and slash", respectively. However, in the original, these perks are useless little more than full. Especially if you're playing on Legendary difficulty level, the effect of this perk unnoticed. In the original, the Daedric waraxe inflicted some 18 units damage on 3 rank ofÂ "Limbsplitter" perk.
So I significantly increased the damage from bleeding in perks "Limbsplitter" and "Hack and slash"
So, if earlier, the same Daedric Battleaxe applied 12, 15 and 18 units damage by 1, 2 and 3 Ranks "Limbsplitter", now it gets 45, 70 and 85 units of damage.As you can see, the damage from bleeding was significantly increased, and now perks demand. Most likely you will even enjoy a walk with axes.

In the original battleaxes and waraxes and was applied the same damage from bleeding. Now the battleaxe will do more damage from bleeding than araxes.

Also I corrected the duration of the effect. Now there will be sharp jumps in time steps at different ranks. In the original, for example, the orcish waraxe deals 1 damage for 4 seconds. This is when the first rank "Limbsplitter". 2 rank duration of 4 seconds perk, too, but at rank 3 has increased the duration of the perk right up to 8 seconds. I fixed the duration of the perk of different ranks in different types of weapons.

There is yet another misunderstanding, which I corrected. Perk does not affect the Nordic, Stalhrim and Dragonbone weapons. Since Dragonbone weapons are the most deadly weapon in the game, and add-ons, and then bleeding it causes the strongest - 90 damage for 8 seconds on the 3rd rank.
Sorry for my English. I'm russian.
